Description: Fragment of weft-faced plain weave, cream wool with long brushed nap on one face; warp-cream wool (S/c.8), weft-cream wool (slight S/c.36); one reinforced selvedge with three groups of warp threads sand extra circuit of main weft, other edges cut or torn; from a garment, perhaps a mantle
Curator's comments: Unreg. 91; previously in grey plan chest in Student's Room;
